title: Master Number 11 in Numerology and Its Many Meanings

steps.title: The Master Number 11 amplifies the characteristics of number 2.
steps.content: The Master Number 11 amplifies the characteristics of number 2. The Master Numbers in numerology are 11, 22, and 33. They are much rarer compared to the standard numbers (1 through 9) and bring with them a lot of potential and power. However, along with all of that potential comes a bit of pressure to live up to such high expectations. When the number 11 is reduced (the sum of its two numbers is taken), you’re left with the number 2 (1 + 1 = 2). This means that the Master Number 11 possess the same type of energy as 2, but it manifests itself in a much more powerful way. [1] X Research source For example, people with 2 in their numerology charts are sensitive and affectionate, so people with 11 in their charts may experience these feelings much more strongly and be more influenced by them in their daily life.

steps.title: Your Soul Urge Number is what drives your inner self.
steps.content: Your Soul Urge Number is what drives your inner self. Looking at the traits that come with your Soul Urge Number (also called your “Heart’s Desire Number”) can help you answer the question “What is my purpose?” The characteristics that come from your Soul Urge Number are the one’s that come from deep within your heart, and they’re essentially the essence that makes you up as a person. [2] X Research source You calculate your Soul Urge Number by adding the numerical values of the vowels in your full name and reducing them to get a single number. The values of each vowel are as follows: A = 1 E = 5 I = 9 O = 6 U = 3 Y = 7 If you were to find the Soul Urge Number for the name “John Doe,” it would look like the following: Sum of vowels (O, O, E) : 6 + 6 + 5 = 17 Reduction : 1 + 7 = 8 John Doe’s Soul Urge Number is 8.

steps.title: You likely have a very great sense of intuition.
steps.content: You likely have a very great sense of intuition. In your case, you probably feel like you can trust your gut instinct, even when it comes to really important decisions. You carefully listen to others and take in all the information you can from the world around you, but when it’s time to make a decision, you go with what your own mind and heart are telling you. [3] X Research source

steps.title: You possess a lot of inner wisdom and intelligence.
steps.content: You possess a lot of inner wisdom and intelligence. You’re likely someone who loves to learn and is always looking to find out more about the world around you. Your friends are probably surprised by how many random facts you like to share with them. Along with book smarts, you also likely have a lot of inner wisdom that simply came from your own life experiences. You like to think about more abstract topics and questions that may not have answers. As a result, you likely have a very open-minded personality. [4] X Research source

steps.title: You take your time in thinking decisions through.
steps.content: You take your time in thinking decisions through. While you might go with your gut when making most decisions, that doesn't mean that you act irrationally and don’t think about the consequences. In fact, you likely take a good amount of time thinking things through. You like to explore all the different possibilities and make your decision only when you’ve heard all of the information. After that, you might let your instincts take the wheel and guide you to the best choice. [5] X Research source This thoroughness might turn into procrastination sometimes. But it’s not because you’re putting off a decision or being lazy. Rather, you’re taking your time looking at every angle, and this might cause you to miss the deadline or cut it very close.

steps.title: You are likely very in tune with other people’s emotions.
steps.content: You are likely very in tune with other people’s emotions. Maybe you can’t really explain it, but you might just have a natural ability to read others and figure out what they’re thinking and feeling. Some might even say you’re a bit telepathic since it feels like you can read their minds. You’re good at reading between the lines, so even though someone might say one thing, you know what it is they’re really trying to convey. [6] X Trustworthy Source HelpGuide Nonprofit organization dedicated to providing free, evidence-based mental health and wellness resources. Go to source

steps.title: Your Personality Number reveals how others see you.
steps.content: Your Personality Number reveals how others see you. While your Soul Urge Number concerns itself with your inner self, your Personality Number focuses on the traits you project outwards for everyone to see. Find your Personality Number by adding together the numerical values of the consonants in your full name and reducing them until you get a single number. [7] X Research source The numerical values of each consonant are as follows: J, S = 1 B, K, T = 2 C, L = 3 D, M, V = 4 N, W = 5 F, X = 6 G, P, Y = 7 H, Q, Z = 8 R = 9 If you were to find the Personality Number for Christopher Smith (using the vowels C, H, R, S, T, P, H, R, S, M, T, H), the process would look like this: Sum of consonants : 3 + 8 + 9 + 1 + 2 + 7 + 8 + 9 + 1 + 4 + 2 + 8 = 62 Reduction : 6 + 2 = 8 Christopher Smith’s Personality Number is 8

steps.title: You’re a natural-born leader.
steps.content: You’re a natural-born leader. Your deep sense of intuition, endless knowledge, and optimism make you appear as a trustworthy leader to many. You’re also likely a very adventurous person, and it may just come naturally to you to lead others on new journeys and expeditions. You presumably like to be confident in your decisions, hence why you might take a bit more time considering all of your options. This makes you appear like a reliable leader that people can look up to. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Your charisma attracts others to you.
steps.content: Your charisma attracts others to you. You’re probably a very outgoing and lively person, and people are just naturally drawn to you like a moth to a flame. Along with being very introspective and in tune with the world around you, you also know how to just have fun. Your sense of adventure might make you more excited to seek out new thrills and find ways to have the most fun. [9] X Research source

steps.title: You’re a dependable friend.
steps.content: You’re a dependable friend. Your friends likely see you as gentle, understanding, patient, and always willing to lend a helping hand. You most likely take joy in helping others work through their problems and are probably willing to drop whatever it is you’re doing to be by your friend’s side when they need you. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Your romantic partner likely sees you as devoted and affectionate.
steps.content: Your romantic partner likely sees you as devoted and affectionate. When it comes down to it, you’re likely a very romantic person. You probably love to receive affection in all forms, and you’re more than happy to return that affection. For all the careful thinking you do, you’re sure to take your time in picking only the best of the best when it comes to romantic partners. So when you find The One, you’re probably going to stick by them for a long time. [11] X Research source

steps.title: A Life Path Number gives a glimpse of your life’s potential outline.
steps.content: A Life Path Number gives a glimpse of your life’s potential outline. Your Life Path Number is considered one of the most important numbers in numerology, as it gives you an overall look at the major themes in your life and the path you’re meant to take. You find this number by adding together and reducing the numbers in your birth date until you get a single number. [12] X Research source For example, you would fine the Life Path Number of someone with a birthday of October 13, 1995 (10-13-1995) using the following process: Month reduction : 1 + 0 = 1 Day reduction : 1 + 3 = 4 Year first reduction : 1 + 9 + 9 + 5 = 24 Year second reduction : 2 + 4 = 6 Sum of month, day, and year : 1 + 4 + 6 = 11 Someone who was born on October 13, 1995 has a Life Path Number of 11.

steps.title: As a Life Path 11, you’re destined to help others.
steps.content: As a Life Path 11, you’re destined to help others. Your compassionate side and natural leadership skills likely make you yearn to help others in any way you can. So when it comes to careers, teaching is probably something that suits you well. There’s no greater act of service than nurturing the minds of the next generation. On the other hand, being a business manager might also be your calling. You’re a born leader, so it might just feel natural to you to take charge of a team and lead them toward success. [13] X Research source

steps.title: You are likely always aiming high and trying to be your best self.
steps.content: You are likely always aiming high and trying to be your best self. There’s a correlation between the number 11 and success. When you put two 1s back to back, you get an arrow that’s pointing up. This symbolizes someone who’s willing to do anything to achieve their dreams. You likely aim high and don’t take failure as an option. When things get tough, you persevere and look for a new solution. For you, no dream is too big. [14] X Research source

steps.title: You’d probably flourish from turning your hobbies into a career.
steps.content: You’d probably flourish from turning your hobbies into a career. You might feel happiest doing work that doesn’t actually feel like work. In other words, you probably like the idea of being able to make a living by pursuing your passions and hobbies. It’ll take hard work and dedication, but there’s nothing stopping you from turning what you love into a career. [15] X Research source For example, if you love photography, maybe being an event photographer, opening your own gallery, or being a photojournalist are careers that sound appealing to you. Or, if you enjoy traveling, you might consider looking into writing for travel magazines, helping on service projects that take you around the world, or teaching in a different country.

steps.title: Your Destiny Number highlights your gifts and shortcomings.
steps.content: Your Destiny Number highlights your gifts and shortcomings. If your Life Path Number tells you your greater purpose, your Destiny Number (also called your “Expression Number”) reveals the abilities you possess to achieve this greater purpose. Find your Expression Number by adding together the numerical values of the letters in your full name, then reduce them until you get a single number. [16] X Research source The numerical values of each letter are as follows: A, J, S = 1 B, K, T = 2 C, L, U = 3 D, M, V = 4 E, N, W = 5 F, O, X = 6 G, P, Y = 7 H, Q, Z = 8 I, R = 9 The process to find the Destiny Number for someone named John Smith would look like this: Sum of letters (J, O, H, N, S, M, I, T, H) : 1 + 6 + 8 + 5 + 1 + 4 + 9 + 2 + 8 = 44 Reduction : 4 + 4 = 8 John Smith has a Destiny Number of 8.

steps.title: You are optimistic about what the future holds.
steps.content: You are optimistic about what the future holds. Your friends and family might view you as the optimist of the group. It might seem like you’re always able to find the silver lining and put a positive spin on even the most negative of situations. To you, the world probably seems full of endless possibilities. Your thirst for knowledge and deep understanding of people drives you forward, and you’re likely optimistic that you can make any of your dreams a reality. [17] X Research source

steps.title: You have a lot of ideas that you’re just waiting to tap into.
steps.content: You have a lot of ideas that you’re just waiting to tap into. Are you the type of person to have so many ideas swirling around your head that you don’t even know where to begin? Don’t worry, that’s a common trait of people who have a Destiny Number of 11. You’re probably just bursting at the seams with ideas for new innovations, ideas for how to improve yourself, and thoughts about how to make the world an overall better place to be. [18] X Research source If you have the time, make sure to jot down these thoughts by journaling or just keeping a note on your phone. You probably don’t want any of those great ideas to get lost as new ones keep flooding in.

steps.title: You surround yourself with loving and fulfilling relationships.
steps.content: You surround yourself with loving and fulfilling relationships. In order to make sure that you’re actually able to achieve your dreams and live an overall fulfilling life, you might be a bit pickier when it comes to letting people get close to you. But you have your reasons! You probably just want to make sure that these people will stay loyal to you and be by your side every step of the way. You yourself are very compassionate and understanding, so it makes sense that you would want people just like that in your life. [19] X Research source You might notice that your circle of close friends is rather on the small side, maybe just 2 or 3 people. But once someone has been accepted as your friend, they can rest assured that you’ll stick by them for a long time to come.

steps.title: Put your needs first once in a while.
steps.content: Put your needs first once in a while. Your compassion and empathy are incredibly admirable, but be sure to check in with yourself once in a while to make sure you’re not spreading yourself too thin. While it may be tempting to try and help everyone, remember that your wants and needs are also extremely important. Take a step back every now and then and just spend some time with yourself . When you come back, you’ll be recharged and ready to continue helping those around you. [20] X Research source Take time to pursue your own hobbies or even start a new one. Explore your thoughts and emotions by journaling, go for a walk to clear your mind, or pamper yourself with something like a massage or spa day.

steps.title: Give your mind a break from all of your thoughts every now and then.
steps.content: Give your mind a break from all of your thoughts every now and then. You probably have a lot of great ideas that you’re just waiting to unleash upon the world, but it’s also probably super exhausting to always be thinking so much. Like a computer, sometimes we need to shut our thoughts off for a bit so that they don’t overheat and drain our battery. Remember to take mental rest days , and don’t feel like you have to constantly push yourself to figure out everything. [21] X Research source Try your hand at meditating as a way to calm your thoughts and take a break from reality for a bit. Distract your brain in a healthy way when you get caught up on a problem. Do some light exercises, go for a walk, or meet up with friends for a casual chat to keep your mind from fixating too hard on one specific thought.

steps.title: Focus on your reality and what is possible.
steps.content: Focus on your reality and what is possible. You probably have many ambitious goals and want to see all of them through until the very end. However, your drive might sometimes turn into impatience when things don’t go as planned. When this happens, take a deep breath and stay calm. Life is full of twists and turns. Don’t push yourself to achieve something that’s simply out of your control. Focus on what you can do and put your energy towards that. [22] X Trustworthy Source Harvard Business Review Online and print journal covering topics related to business management practices Go to source Take time to set specific goals that you know you can achieve. Instead of thinking in terms of the big picture, coming up with smaller goals will help you feel like you’re making progress when you complete them. Plan ahead for bumps in the road when you’re starting a project. Thinking realistically can help you prepare for unforeseen circumstances and will make dealing with them a lot easier and smoother as they pop up. Reader Poll: We asked 216 wikiHow readers what they find most helpful for coping with setbacks, and 52% of them said reflecting on the lessons learned and moving forward. [Take Poll]
